entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kouchibouguac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
